attributes.action: Curb Coffee Cup Waste - Introduce a tax on disposable hot drink cups
attributes.background: 2.5bn coffee cups are thrown away annually in the UK, and only 1 in 400 (0.25%) are recycled . The rest are sent to landfill. With the market's continued growth, it's time action was taken to curb the coffee cup waste. Help us reduce waste and encourage re-usables, with a small tax on hot drink cups

rejection.details:
We think you petition is similar to this one: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163414

You might want to consider signing that petition instead.
